title: do we still get warning/ban from tribunal now or it has been refreshed since its new season
body:
im having a precarious games

can riot answer me

replies.body: Yes you can, but since it is preseason, you don't lose your rewards, and you will only need to reform to get your Hextech Crafting rights back.

TRIBUNAL DOESN'T EXIST!

IT HASN'T EXISTED FOR THREE YEARS!
